rev.desc.rev.desc: Added additional branching to issue proper error messages if users enters a date into the field that this routine is attached to. Also changed the statements that prefixed the time with todays date to make it Y2K compliant. Issue error message if input field not properly Masked.

descript.descript: Added additional branching to issue proper error messages if users enters a date into the field that this routine is attached to. Also changed the statements that prefixed the time with todays date to make it Y2K compliant. Issue error message if input field not properly Masked.
